items.title: Leon Metzger on board
items.summary: Hello, I am Leon Metzger the other developer of AgentCell_re. Nice to meet you!
items.content_html:
Hello, I am Leon Metzger the other developer of AgentCell_re.
Nice to meet you!

items.title: AgentCell_re is live!
items.summary: Uwe Grueters and Leon Metzger proudly present AgentCell_re (2021), a revitalization of the ancient Inidividual-based Chemotaxis Model AgentCell (2007)…
items.content_html: Uwe Grueters and Leon Metzger proudly present AgentCell_re (2021), a revitalization of the ancient Inidividual-based Chemotaxis Model AgentCell (2007) in RePast Simphony 2.8. As its predecessor AgentCell_re simulates movement of E. coli bacteria along an aspartate gradient using stochsim to resemble the metabolic receptor network.
